rave.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to talk in an angry, uncontrolled, or crazy way
rave.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: He was still ranting and raving the next morning.
Lisa raved on about how awful it all was.
rave.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a big event where people dance to loud music with a strong beat and often take drugs
rave.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: strong praise for a new play, book etc
rave.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: The play got raves from the critics.
